text:
panies may claim 
their formula is closest to 
breastmilk and better than 
others, all must meet regulated 
standards and there is actually 
very	little	difference	between	
them all. The most expensive 
milk is not necessarily the 
best, supermarket own brands 
are much cheaper and meet 
the required regulations. 
In the past it was thought 
better to stick to one brand, 
but there is no evidence to 
suggest that changing brands 
does any good or any harm.
Choosing a formula
Infant formula milk
